Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQOTIA
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, QHOSP AS XxHospital, Q1 AS DateOfAssessment, Q2 AS DateOfAdmission, Q3 AS OccupationalTherapist, Q4 AS Funding, Q5 AS Diagnosis, Q6 AS MedicalHistory, Q7 AS Social, Q8 AS DischargeDestination, Q9 AS ClientPhone, Q10 AS NOKContactDetails, Q11 AS DNS, Q12 AS HH, Q13 AS MoW, Q14 AS HM, Q15 AS PersonalCare, Q16 AS PAG, Q17 AS Safetylink, Q18 AS Accommodation, Q19 AS AccommodationComments, Q20 AS HomeLayoutReportedBy, Q21 AS HomeAssessmentDate, Q22 AS FrontSteps, Q23 AS FrontRail, Q24 AS FrontRailComment, Q25 AS BackSteps, Q26 AS BackRail, Q27 AS BackRailComment, Q28 AS InternalSteps, Q29 AS InternalRail, Q30 AS InternalRailComment, Q31 AS Bathroom, Q32 AS BathroomDistanceFromBedroom, Q33 AS Shower, Q34 AS ShowerHeight, Q35 AS ShowerRails, Q36 AS ShowerScreenType, Q37 AS Bath, Q38 AS BathHeight, Q39 AS BathRails, Q40 AS BathRailsComment, Q41 AS Bathboard, Q42 AS ToiletSituated, Q43 AS ToiletDoorSwings, Q44 AS ToiletHeight, Q45 AS ToiletDistanceFromBedroom, Q46 AS ToiletRails, Q47 AS ToiletRailsComments, Q48 AS CommentsRecommendations, Q49 AS AidsRequiredForSafeDischarge, Q50 AS AmbulationAidPreviousFunctionLevel, Q51 AS AmbulationAidCurrentFunctionLevel, Q52 AS SittingBalancePreviousFunctionLevel, Q53 AS SittingBalanceCurrentFunctionLevel, Q54 AS StandingBalancePreviousFunctionLevel, Q55 AS StandingBalanceCurrentFunctionLevel, Q56 AS BedMobilityTransfersPreviousFunctionLevel, Q57 AS BedMobilityTransfersCurrentFunctionLevel, Q58 AS TransfersPreviousFunctionLevel, Q59 AS TransfersCurrentFunctionLevel, Q60 AS UpperLimbDominancePreviousFunctionLevel, Q61 AS UpperLimbDominanceCurrentFunctionLevel, Q62 AS LowerLimbPreviousFunctionLevel, Q63 AS LowerLimbCurrentFunctionLevel, Q64 AS VisionPreviousFunctionLevel, Q65 AS VisionCurrentFunctionLevel, Q66 AS HearingPreviousFunctionLevel, Q67 AS HearingCurrentFunctionLevel, Q68 AS FallsHistoryPreviousFunctionLevel, Q69 AS FallsHistoryCurrentFunctionLevel, Q70 AS EatingFeedingPreviousFunctionLevel, Q71 AS EatingFeedingCurrentFunctionLevel, Q72 AS GroomingPFL, Q73 AS GroomingCFL, Q74 AS DressingPFL, Q75 AS DressingCFL, Q76 AS BathingPFL, Q77 AS BathingCFL, Q78 AS ToiletingPFL, Q79 AS ToiletingCFL, Q80 AS ContinencePFL, Q81 AS ContinenceCFL, Q82 AS MedicationPFL, Q83 AS MedicationCFL, Q84 AS MealPreparationPFL, Q85 AS MealPreparationCFL, Q86 AS HouseworkPFL, Q87 AS HouseworkCFL, Q88 AS LaundryPFL, Q89 AS LaundryCFL, Q90 AS ShoppingPFL, Q91 AS ShoppingCFL, Q92 AS GardeningPFL, Q93 AS GardeningCFL, Q94 AS TransportPFL, Q95 AS TransportCFL, Q96 AS BankingPFL, Q97 AS BankingCFL, Q98 AS WritingPFL, Q99 AS WritingCFL, Q100 AS TelephoneUsePFL, Q101 AS TelephoneUseCFL, Q102 AS LeisurePFL, Q103 AS LeisureCFL, Q104 AS EmploymentPFL, Q105 AS EmploymentCFL, Q106 AS MemoryMMSEPFL, Q107 AS MemoryMMSECFL, Q108 AS ProblemSolvingPFL, Q109 AS ProblemSolvingCFL, Q110 AS NeglectInattentionPFL, Q111 AS NeglectInattentionCFL, Q112 AS SocialComments, Q113 AS TypeOfBed, Q114 AS BedHeight, Q115 AS KitchenSeat, Q116 AS KitchenSeatHeight, Q117 AS Armchair, Q118 AS ArmchairHeight, Q119 AS ArmchairFurtherAx, Q120 AS OrientationPFL, Q121 AS OrientationCFL, Q122 AS NameOfPersonCompletingForm, Q123 AS DateFormCompleted, QHOSPITAL AS Hospital, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESCreateDate AS DateCreated, QUESCreateTime AS TimeCreated, QUESCreateUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserCreated, QUESScore AS Score, QUESStatusDR AS Status FROM questionnaire.QOTIA
